survey_name: Home Energy Efficiency Upgrade Interest Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand homeowners' interest in and barriers to adopting home energy efficiency upgrades, such as insulation, solar panels, and smart thermostats.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with home energy efficiency upgrades?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to measure awareness levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with home energy efficiency upgrades?

questions.question_text: Which of the following energy efficiency upgrades have you already implemented in your home? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format for this question to capture multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following energy efficiency upgrades have you already implemented in your home? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How interested are you in making energy efficiency upgrades to your home in the next 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this single-choice question to gauge interest levels.

script.question_text: How interested are you in making energy efficiency upgrades to your home in the next 12 months?

questions.question_text: What factors would motivate you to invest in home energy efficiency upgrades? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Very interested' or 'Somewhat interested'
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkbox) with conditional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors would motivate you to invest in home energy efficiency upgrades? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Very interested' or 'Somewhat interested'

questions.question_text: What are the main barriers preventing you from investing in energy efficiency upgrades for your home?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Neutral', 'Not very interested', or 'Not interested at all'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio button) with conditional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are the main barriers preventing you from investing in energy efficiency upgrades for your home?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Neutral', 'Not very interested', or 'Not interested at all'

questions.question_text: How much would you be willing to spend on energy efficiency upgrades in the next year?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Very interested' or 'Somewhat interested'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button to quantify potential investment levels.

script.question_text: How much would you be willing to spend on energy efficiency upgrades in the next year?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Very interested' or 'Somewhat interested'
